ai-patthana14.35:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.35:1.1_0: Neither gives rise to the thought. ...
ai-patthana14.35:2.1_0: The cause undetermined teaching doesn’t arise because of undetermined phenomena.
ai-patthana14.35:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
